altername_name: Legend of the Hungry Wolf: Wild Ambition
name: Fatal Fury: Wild Ambition
overview: A long standing vendetta culminates with excitement in Fatal Fury: Wild Ambition. With vindictive rage, one fighter searches for truth and redemption against the ruthless crime lord who murdered his father. Fists fly, teeth fall, and pain resounds when you wipe the floor with some of the toughest fighters ever to stand in your way. Heroes are forgotten, but Legends never die...
